body.name: AstroAI Tire Inflator Portable Air Compressor Tire Air Pump for Car Tires - Car Accessories, 12V DC Auto Pump with Digital Pressure Gauge, Emergency LED Light for Bicycle, Balloons
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 2 hrs
features: TOUGHULTRA TECHNOLOGY, ENHANCED DURABILITY: This tire inflator is manufactured with AstroAI’s unique ToughUltra technology, so all of its core parts, including its cylinder, motor gears, and connection rod, are built using a powder metallurgy integrated molding technique. This revolutionary manufacturing process greatly enhances the inflator’s durability and increases its service life by 30%.

PROGRAMMABLE INFLATION: Use the "M" button to set your desired pressure unit, and then press the "+" and "-" buttons to set the desired pressure. The air compressor will automatically shut off when it reaches the pre-set pressure (Please make sure the pressure you set is higher than the current pressure of your tire).

COMPACT SIZE & EASY TO STORE: Featuring a lightweight and compact design, this handy and portable tire inflator can easily fit into glove compartments, seats, trunks, and more. When it isn’t being used, it’s almost unnoticeable.

SMART PRESET & AUTO OFF: The tire inflator’s digital screen provides accurate readouts and 4 pressure units to choose from while its independent buttons allow for intuitive control. You can easily preset the tire pressure and not worry about constantly monitoring it, this smart inflator will automatically shut off once it reaches the desired pressure.

EASY NIGHTTIME USE: Equipped with a backlit screen and a flashlight, this tire inflator brings convenient use, even in dim environments. Its independent LED Button enables one-press flashlight operation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really good for such a modest price!
reviews.reviewText: TL;DR: Yep, go ahead and get this one!I'll be honest, I didn't have high expectations for an inexpensive 12V tire inflator, but this little thing turns out to punch way above its weight in terms of how well it works given the size and price. In fact, I was surprised by how small it is—I didn't realize that it's not much bigger than the size of a shoe. It's quick and easy to use, a totally straightforward piece of machinery that lets you set the pressure level you're looking for, flip a switch, and get what you want.My wife's car has a tire with a bit of a slow leak, so we put this in the back of her car to keep it topped off. She's normally not one to mess around with even this kind of routine maintenance, a little unsure about making sure she does things properly, but after a couple of tries she's had no problem taking care of keeping her wonky tire topped off herself. It's a simple plug and play operation.Good things: It's small—surprisingly small—and lightweight. It's very easy to hook it up, punch in the pressure you want, and get it pumping. Despite its small size, it doesn't take very long at all to add several pounds to a tire. The cord is long enough to do the job. It even comes with a built-in flashlight. If you don't run the pump, you can also check your pressure with it by just hooking it up.Neutral things: The air hose is really short. It's not a big deal, because the pump is light enough that in practice you can get it into position anyway, but it does seem awkward at first. The light weight of the pump itself is great for hauling it around from tire to tire, but also means that when it's running the pump vibrates itself around on the ground. You kind of want to keep a foot on it while it runs.Bad things: The 12V cord is pretty thin and flimsy. I always feel like I'm going to trash it just moving the pump around, although nothing bad has actually happened so far. The cord isn't a separate piece, either, which means that putting away the pump neatly is a bit of an affair: you wind up with the pump and then this roll of cord (with a chunky lighter plug on it) hanging awkwardly off the end of the machine.The upshot: It's really inexpensive and it works great. I'm extremely happy with this air pump and I'd buy it again in a heartbeat. For all my griping above, those things are minor. Fundamentally it's a great product that does the job well, at a price that's more than reasonable. You'll be perfectly happy with this thing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenience & Peace of mind
reviews.reviewText: On a recent trip, we had a difficult time finding a service station with a functioning air compressor when our tire pressures dropped due to a large temperature swing. Once we were home, I made it a priority to get a portable compressor in each of our vehicles. I've done some fairly thorough testing and these units have so far proven to effective, efficient and easy to use. They have aired tires up quickly, and shut off at the selected pressure. They're compact and lightweight. Hooking up the power cord and valve connector is easy and intuitive. They'll not replace my garage compressor, but to keep in the car for occasional use they appear to be perfect. I found a small cheap tool bag to keep things together in the cars. Only suggestion I would make to the manufacturer is to provide a storage bag to keep them in. I found a small cheap tool bag to keep things together in the cars. I'll feel better when I'm traveling, and even more so when my kid is traveling - knowing there is a compressor handy just in case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Only used it once but straight out of the box I was able to top off all 4 tires in less then 10 mins (5-10 psi per tire) , without any issues and it stopped at desired PSI. Keep in mind the unit is small which means it can over heat if were to run nonstop for multiple vehicle, let it cool down. For the price seems to be worth keeping on hand to keep tire pressure accurate and small enough to pack for a road. I used it outside the sound level was typical of a unit this size it was not obnoxiously loud.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lifesaver on the Road: AstroAI Portable Tire Inflator Review
reviews.reviewText: The AstroAI Tire Inflator Portable Air Compressor has proven to be a true lifesaver on the road, and I can't sing its praises enough. This inexpensive yet highly impressive product has become an essential part of my car accessories, offering reliability and peace of mind during unexpected situations.I initially purchased this portable air compressor to keep in my car for emergencies, and it has surpassed my expectations. The digital pressure gauge provides accurate readings, allowing me to inflate my car tires to the recommended pressure with ease. The 12V DC auto pump operates efficiently, ensuring a quick and hassle-free inflation process.The true test came during a road trip when I experienced an unexpected tire pressure issue almost 350 miles away from home. Local tire shops could not fix the small crack in my wheel, and my only options were to leave my car or repeatedly fill air to make it back home. This little device turned a potentially disastrous situation into a manageable one. I had to fill the tire seven times on my way back, but each time, this device performed flawlessly. It not only saved me from the hassle of leaving my car hundreds of miles away but also eliminated the stress of arranging transportation for my family.The compact and portable design of this air compressor makes it a convenient companion for any road trip or daily commute. Its affordability, coupled with its impressive performance, makes it a must-have for every car owner. I was so impressed with its functionality that I purchased another one for my wife's car.In conclusion, the AstroAI Tire Inflator Portable Air Compressor is a gem of a product that I wholeheartedly recommend to fellow drivers. It's a cost-effective solution to unexpected tire issues and has proven its worth in real-life scenarios. Don't leave home without it!

reviews.reviewTitle: Works great! Even in cold temperatures!!
reviews.reviewText: I had compact air compressors in the past, but this one is great. Easy to use and I really like the digital display. I needed to use it this winter and it worked perfectly in -5C (20F) temperatures. Filled my low tire quickly. Other great feature is that you can set your PSI on the compressor to automatically shut off when it reaches desired pressure. Nice and compact, I store it in my tire compartment in my SUV. So far, happy with this purchase.

El producto es muy bueno con nivel de ruido propio del tamaño del compresor, pudiera mejorar. Las lecturas son fáciles de ver y son muy cercanas a las de un compresor automático como de las gasolineras. Tiene muchos accesorio que aun no uso pero tiene muchas posibilidades de uso.
Hasta el momento me ha funcionado perfecto, muy práctico, cumple con la funcionalidad que se necesita.

Come da titolo, ho avuto necessità di utilizzare questo compressore più volte. A distanza di tempo posso confermare che è un buon prodotto. Facile da utilizzare, impostare pressione, display illuminato. Istruzioni comprensibili, compatto e versatile in quanto adatto a gonfiare diversi tipi di camera d'aria, munito di accessori. Ottimo rapporto qualità/prezzo.
Étonnement petit,et si puissant. Très bon article.
